```js
<Form form="form-example2" layout={state.layout} onSubmit={logger.log}>
    <FormFieldSet legend="Name">
        <Form.Item label="First Name">
            <Form.Field name="firstName" placeholder="First Name" />
        </Form.Item>
        <Form.Item label="Last Name">
            <Form.Field name="lastName" placeholder="Last Name" />
        </Form.Item>
    </FormFieldSet>
    <FormFieldSet legend="Address">
        <Form.Item label="Address">
            <Form.Field name="address" placeholder="Address" />
        </Form.Item>
        <Form.Item label="Postcode">
            <Form.Field name="postcode" placeholder="Postcode" />
        </Form.Item>
    </FormFieldSet>
    <Form.Item>
        <Form.Button htmlType="submit">Create</Form.Button>
    </Form.Item>
</Form>
```
